short_summary: Repair and Replace Locking Devices in 9 Wing Gander
description: The work under this Standing Offer comprises the furnishing of all labour, material and equipment to repair/replace locking devices and doors on an "as and when requested basis" at various locations in buildings at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, Nfld.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Title
Repair and Replace Locking Devices - Various Buildings, 9 Wing Gander

### Tender Reference Number
WS4639291293

### Tender Closing Date
23 July 2024, 14:00

### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Standing Offer for the repair and replacement of locking devices and doors at various locations within buildings at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, Newfoundland. The contract duration is two years, with an option to extend for an additional year. The estimated cost for this opportunity is within the $100,001 to $500,000 cost category.

### Key Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Regions of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador

### Delivery and Services
The contractor will provide all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to repair or replace locking devices and doors at various locations within buildings at 9 Wing Gander.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Contact Information
For additional information, please contact Gary Bryant at gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Access to Tender Information
The tender information is available at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20137011?extsite=MjAxMzcwMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20137011?extsite=MjAxMzcwMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) Note: Please check the availability and accessibility of the tender information on the webpage.
